data.comment: Today's referee, Tomoya Araki, has blown to start the match.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Tomoya Araki signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Tomoya Araki signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
In the minute 6, Yuya Asano for Hiroshima gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Tomoya Araki awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tomoya Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
In the minute 14, Hiroshima advance rapidly upfield but Tomoya Araki blows for offside.
Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yokohama Marinos are coming forward and Junior Santos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Hiroshima.
Yokohama Marinos are whistled for offside.
In the minute 21, Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Hiroshima are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 24, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Tomoya Araki.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 28, Tomoya Araki signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Yokohama Marinos have an attacking throw-in.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Tomoya Araki signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Yokohama Marinos's area.
Hiroshima's Yuya Asano gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Hiroshima's Leandro Pereira misses with an attempt on goal.
Tomoya Araki awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Tomoya Araki.
In the minute 33, Leandro Pereira is on target to give Hiroshima a 1-0 advantage.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 38, Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a first substitution, with Takuya Kida replacing Kota Watanabe.
In the minute 40, Yokohama Marinos drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Ezequiel (Hiroshima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 41, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Tomoya Araki.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 45, Tomoya Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Yuya Asano (Hiroshima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Hiroshima's Shunki Higashi breaks free at EDION Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at EDION Stadium.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 49, Yokohama Marinos drive upfield and Theerathon Bunmathan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hiroshima defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Hiroshima.
Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
In the minute 49, Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
In the minute 51, Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
Yokohama Marinos are caught offside.
Tomoya Araki signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
Tomoya Araki signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Yokohama Marinos's area.
In the minute 54, Tomoya Araki signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Tomoya Araki.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In Hiroshima Yokohama Marinos drive forward through Junior Santos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
Tomoya Araki awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Tsukasa Morishima is on a sub for Ezequiel for Hiroshima.
The home team replace Shunki Higashi with Yusuke Chajima.
In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 62, Thiago Martins blunders with an own goal. This makes it 2-0.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Marcos Junior is replacing Takuya Wada for the away team.
In the minute 67, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Tomoya Araki.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at EDION Stadium.
Hiroshi Jofuku is making the team's third substitution at EDION Stadium with Ryo Nagai replacing Yuya Asano.
In the minute 73, Tomoya Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
Hiroshima's Ryo Nagai is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
At EDION Stadium, Daizen Maeda has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
At EDION Stadium, Hiroshima are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 76, Yokohama Marinos make their third substitution with Ado Onaiwu replacing Jun Amano.
Kota Mizunuma is replacing Daizen Maeda for the away team.
In the minute 77, Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Hiroshima.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Tomoya Araki signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
In Hiroshima, Yokohama Marinos push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ryo Nagai of Hiroshima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
The home team have replaced Yoshifumi Kashiwa with Akira Ibayashi. This is the fourth substitution made today by Hiroshi Jofuku.
Hiroshima make their fifth substitution with Douglas Vieira replacing Leandro Pereira.
In the minute 83, Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Tomoya Araki signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Yokohama Marinos's area.
Yokohama Marinos drives forward and Ado Onaiwu gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 87, Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Yusuke Chajima gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hiroshima.
In the minute 88, Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
Hiroshima have been given a penalty at EDION Stadium...
Shinnosuke Hatanaka (Yokohama Marinos) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Hiroshima.
Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Yokohama Marinos have an attacking throw-in.
Tomoya Araki signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have been given a penalty...
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Ryo Nagai gives Hiroshima a 3-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Goal! Thiago Martins nets a penalty for Yokohama Marinos. They now trail 3-1.
